en.mdImageExtractorDesc: Extract base64 images from markdown files
en.mdImageExtractorLongDesc: This tool extracts base64 encoded images from Markdown files, converts them to JPG format, and packages them into a ZIP file for download. Perfect for handling Markdown notes or documents with embedded images.
en.dragOrClick: Drag file here or click to select

zh.mdImageExtractorLongDesc: 这个工具可以从Markdown文件中提取Base64编码的图片，将它们转换为JPG图片文件，并打包为ZIP压缩包供下载。非常适合处理包含内嵌图片的Markdown笔记或文档。
zh.dragOrClick: 拖放文件到这里或点击选择文件
